mapper.update: update dealer_product_profits set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loan_period = #{loanPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_role = #{channelRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, profit = #{profit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, dealer_product_id = #{dealerProductId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_available = #{isAvailable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_on = #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, company_id, loan_period, channel_role, price, profit, dealer_product_id, is_available, is_delete, created_on, created_by, data_type from dealer_product_profits where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, company_id, loan_period, channel_role, price, profit, dealer_product_id, is_available, is_delete, created_on, created_by, data_type from dealer_product_profits
